title: Canton of St. Gallen
summary: The canton of St. Gallen, also canton of St Gall (German: Kanton St. Gallen Sankt Gallen ; dialectally /saŋkˈalːə/,[3] French: canton de Saint-Gall, Italian: Cantone di San Gallo, Romansh: chantun Son Gagl), is a canton of Switzerland. The capital is St. Gallen.
